game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the heart of the program. This is the class that link all the others classes and run the game round by round with an implementation of the powers of the characters.
    Author:
    bpotiron

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String player1Name,
            java.lang.String player2Name)
        Constructor of a Game. It initialize the game. After the construction of the Game you need to run the method "launchGame".
        Parameters:
        player1Name - the name of the first player
        player2Name - the name of the second player

      • Game

        public Game()
        If the game is not construct with the names of the two players, then this constructor calls the constructor with the default names (Player1 and Player2)

    • Method Detail

      • isWinner

        public boolean isWinner(Player player)
        Compare the player in parameter to the winner
        Parameters:
        player - the player compared to the winner
        Returns:
        true if the player in parameter is the winner

      • setWinner

        private void setWinner(Player player)
        Set the winner of the game
        Parameters:
        player - became the winner of the game

      • setCrowned

        private void setCrowned(Player player)
        Set the crowned player
        Parameters:
        player - became the crowned player

      • isCrowned

        private boolean isCrowned(Player player)
        Compare the player in param to the crowned player
        Parameters:
        player - the player comparated to the crowned player
        Returns:
        true if the player in param is the crowned player

      • initializeGame

        private void initializeGame()
        This method initialize the game by giving to the two players 4 cards and two coins.

      • launchGame

        public void launchGame()
        This method launch all the game (round by round) of Citadelle.

      • descriptionStatePlayer

        private void descriptionStatePlayer(Player currentPlayer,
                                    Character c)
        This method describe the status of a player during the game. the status includes : the name of the player, his money, the character he's playing, his deck and his city.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - the player that will be describe
        c - the character the the player is playing

      • chooseBetweenPickCardOrTakeGold

        private void chooseBetweenPickCardOrTakeGold(Player currentPlayer)
        This method implement the action of a character when he had to choose between take two coins of gold in the bank of draw two cards in the pick and keep only one.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - the player involved in the action

      • buildDistrict

        private boolean buildDistrict(Player currentPlayer)
        This method implement the action : build a district. When a player play a character, he can choose to build a district or no.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - the player involved in the action
        Returns:
        true if the player built a district. Else return false if the player decided to not build a district or if there is an exception (for example if the player hasn't enough money to build a district or if the player already have the district that he decided to build in his city).

      • proposeToActivePowerOfCharacter

        private boolean proposeToActivePowerOfCharacter()
        This method calls ProposeToActivePowerOfCharacter(string s) with an empty argument
        Returns:
        true if the player decided to active the power of his character. Else false.

      • proposeToActivePowerOfCharacter

        private boolean proposeToActivePowerOfCharacter(java.lang.String s)
        This method propose to active the power of a character
        Parameters:
        s - description of the power of the character (if empty string no description of the power)
        Returns:
        true if the player accept to active the power of his character. Else false.

      • characterGetGoldFromHisFamily

        private void characterGetGoldFromHisFamily(Player currentPlayer,
                                           Character c)
        This method is called when a character decided to active his power and the power includes that the character get gold from his affiliated family.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - the player playing the character will received the gold
        c - the character affiliate to the power (used to know the family)

      • actionMagician

        private void actionMagician(Player currentPlayer)
        This method is specific for activate the power of the magician. The magician can exchange his deck with the deck of the adverse player or he can exchange some cards of his deck with new ones in the pick (he can't choose the cards in the pick).
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - the player who active the power of the magician

      • actionCondottiere

        private void actionCondottiere(Player currentPlayer)
        This method is specifically called when the power of the condottiere is activated. The condottiere can destroy one district of the adverse player by paying the price of the district to destroy - 1.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - the player which is actually the condottiere
